verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Search me O God and
know my heart today
Try me O Savior
Know my thoughts I pray
See if there be
Some wicked way in me
Cleanse me from every sin
And set me free

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I praise Thee Lord
For cleansing me from sin
Fulfill Thy Word and
Make me pure within
Fill me with fire
where once I burned
with shame
Grant my desire
To magnify Thy Name

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord take my life
And make it wholly Thine
Fill my poor heart with
Thy great love divine
Take all my will
My passion self and pride
I now surrender Lord
In me abide

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O Holy Ghost revival
Comes from Thee
Send a revival
Start the work in me
Thy Word declares
Thou wilt supply our need
For blessings now
O Lord I humbly plead
